Couldn't reproduce this. We had a Jira bug filed -- http://www.openlaszlo.org/jira/browse/IBM-34 -- under "Multi-page editor doesn't open lzx files in WST 1.0", but that was resolved as fixed.

Perhaps we'd have more luck reproducing this if the reporter supplied the steps he took to get there.
install mozilla 1.7  then everything works fine.
